name: Our Earth
description:
Our Earth is about saving the world from climate change. You do that by investing in different upgrades that influence a continent's yearly income and emissions. Your goal is to reach zero emissions before 100 years have passed.

The idea is that you invest the money on different upgrades in different categories, and when you're done, you can skip to the next year and get your yearly income added to your budget.

Credits:

  • Thanks to Konstantin_Keller for making the earth 3D-model. The model is licensed under CC Attribution and can be found here

Open-source

This project is open source. All the project files and more info can be found on Github.
